head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WALDEN, FREDERICK E.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WALDEN, FREDERICK E.

block.p: WALDEN-Frederick E. On Oct. 18th, 2000. Beloved brother of Eleanor. Dear cousin of Reverend Kenneth Nilsen and Robert A. Nilsen. Devoted friend of Bernice Bengtsson and Dorothy Weatherington. Visiting Friday, 7-9 PM, at the Clavin Funeral Home, 7722 Fourth Ave., Brooklyn. Religious Service Friday evening, 8 P.M. Funeral Saturday, at 10 A.M.
